page.title: 20WEATHER FLORA BOREHAM NORTH
page.content: Winter 1984/85 was very cold with lots of snow,and hard frosts.Spring was late and when we started the survey in April, the weather was cold the sky was grey, and many trees were bare. Now that we have finished in mid-July the weather is warm and sunny,although we have had some very heavy rain showers.Trees are in leaf and gardens are gay with many flowers, including roses in full bloom.The wheat is almost ripe and beginning to change colour.We found the survey interesting,and we found out a lot about the area. All the people we approached were helpful. Alison Baxter, Heather Buck, Edward Cook, Guy Hammond, Adam Hibbert, Samantha Newland, Kim Rayner, Emma Riley, Mathew Starling, Katy Ward. Our ages vary between 8 and 9 years.
